channel.title: Whonix Release 9
channel.description:
Dear Patrick.
Please can you give me a timeframe when Release 9 comes out? Thank you in Advance for your Answering. The Point is, that i have running a Release 8.2 Server and i will make another Server with Release 9.
Best Regards!
townsend

item.title: Whonix Release 9
item.dc:creator: townsend
item.description:
Hallo dear Patrick.

First let me say…; Thank you for your Answering. Nice to listen the Words “Testing Version 9 and ready to take”. Well, yes it would be great when Main Releases would be upgradable. Probably this is the Main_Listening to all Hidden Service Hoster, off cause myself. Yes please when you have the Chance to give a Release 9 Testing Version, it will be wonderful. Last, let me say, thank you for your fantastic Work and your “Staying For”!

Patrick:

Sorry to say, there is no time frame yet. Whonix 9 is basically ready, but I am still in progress of testing everything. After that I will work on making upgrades from Whonix 8.x to Whonix 9 possible. If it helps, I can soon upload an early testers-only version of Whonix 9.

Best Regards!

townsend

Read full topic
